intro: I am an aspiring software developer specializing in building and occasionally designing exceptional digital experiences.
cryptopia-desc: A website where you can search and track various cryptocurrencies, with a strong emphasis on design.
surfago-desc: A website where you can explore different surfing equipment, gear, and accessories. It offers a variety of lifestyle products tailored to the surf community.
netflix-card: A Netflix clone for browsing movies
netflix-desc: A Netflix clone where users can browse various movies, add them to their must-watch list, and discover more features in a Netflix-like interface. (email: test@gmail.com, pswrd : boblebrick)
aspiro-card: Aspiro is a motivational website designed to inspire and engage users
aspiro-desc: Aspiro is a landing page that emphasizes stunning design over functionality. It uses subtle, yet eye-catching animations powered by Framer Motion to create an engaging user experience. The layout is clean and minimalistic, focusing on aesthetics to communicate a sense of motivation and positivity.
verbto-card: Transformer l'audio en texte grâce à l'IA
verbto-desc: Verbto est une plateforme innovante qui transforme l'audio en texte en utilisant la puissance de l'intelligence artificielle (Whisper AI). Elle intègre une base de données NeonDB pour un stockage efficace, Clerk pour une authentification utilisateur sécurisée et Stripe pour la gestion des paiements. Idéale pour les créateurs de contenu, les étudiants ou toute personne souhaitant convertir rapidement leurs enregistrements vocaux en texte.
